text: Tuomo Sakari Ylipulli (3 March 1965 â€“ 23 July 2021) was a Finnish ski jumper. He was born in Rovaniemi, Finland. He won a gold medal in the Team large hill competition at the 1988 Winter Olympics in Calgary. He also won two gold medals at the FIS Nordic World Ski Championships in 1985 and 1987. Ylipulli died on 23 July 2021 in Helsinki, Finland at the age of 56.Lapin Kansa: Olympiavoittaja Tuomo Ylipulli, 56, on kuollut ==References== Category:1965 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Finland Category:Finnish skiers
title: Tuomo Ylipulli
